title: Villa complain to PGMOL over ´inexperienced´ referee Bramall
description: Aston Villa have written to Professional Game Match Officials Limited (PGMOL) to complain about “inexperienced” referee Thomas Bramall being appointed to Sunday’s costly 2-0 defeat to Manchester United. Villa went into the final day of the Premier League season hoping to seal Champions League qualification, requiring a win at Old Trafford and for one of […] The post Villa complain to PGMOL over ´inexperienced´ referee Bramall appeared first on Soccer News.
author: SoccerNews

title: Atletico ´lacked stability at a crucial moment of the season´, says Simeone
description: Diego Simeone rued Atletico Madrid’s lack of stability at a “crucial moment of the season” but was delighted to end it on a high. At the midway point of the season, Atletico were part of a three-horse race for the LaLiga title, but a major drop-off in March saw them lose ground on eventual winners […] The post Atletico ´lacked stability at a crucial moment of the season´, says Simeone appeared first on Soccer News.
